nodes.text: Vapor Station was a small canyon outpost that was located on the planet Tatooine. It was operated by agents of the Hutt crime lord Sinasu and lay within the territories of Sinasu's rival Hutt Jabba. During the Galactic Civil War, the Rodian hunter Jora assembled a cargo of Krayt dragon eggs and a junior Krayt dragon at Vapor Station, which was to be smuggled to Sinasu on the moon Nar Shaddaa by a group of individuals who were indebted to the Hutt. However, just as Jora briefed the agents for their upcoming assignment, the outpost was raided by a band of Tusken Raiders.
